content.text:
Welcome!

Be careful not to follow/join any pubs until your entire profile is synced -- the "follow" action will be added to your feed, which creates a forked profile that (generally) won't be synced.

Instead, copy over `~/.ssb/gossip.json` and let it sync by itself. I made this mistake for about three weeks before I realized that I'd forked my profile and that nobody could see my messages.
